title: Thai chicken curry
description: This is an easy, foolproof Thai chicken curry recipe. The water chestnuts add a lovely crunch, but should be added at the end so they stay crisp.
ingredients: 4cm/1½in knob of fresh root ginger, peeled and finely grated
250g/9oz sugar snap peas, cut in half lengthways
1 x 225g tin water chestnuts, drained, halved and quartered if large
salt and freshly ground black pepper
